column1: pdf printable version funeral services. sunday june 14, 2015, 11:00 a. m. at congregation agudat achim facts. born: december 7, 1931. place of birth: swampscott, madeath: june 9, 2015. place of death: worcester, maoccupation: vivienne was principal of the hebrew school at the congregation agudat achim in leominster. hobbies: received the light of the torah award from the n. e. chapter of sisterhood; received with her husband, the lifetime achievement award for their commitment to the synagogue. organizations: served as secretary of the board of directors-congregation agudat achim and was a life trustee; past president of the sisterhood and leominster chapter of hadassah. share your thoughts and memories about vivienne (goldfarb) jones in the guestbook. memorial donations. memorial donations can be made to:congregation agudat achim, 268 washington street, leominster, ma 01453. memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
